name: Dark/Night MyAnimeList
description: A dark/night theme for MAL. Includes customisation options. Also removes ads ;) UserCSS version can be found here on GitHub. Additional screenshots can also be found on GitHub. I highly recommend switching to the UserCSS version for more frequent updates (and using Stylus)!

user.name: cicerakes
user.about: No updates or responses here, check GitHub for latest updates! My styles aim to: - Darken the colours while keeping most, if not all, of the site's original design. - Optionally hide ads and other potentially unwanted features. - Sometimes both.
